explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper mentions integrating stochastic elements into the reward function, enabling a reinforcement learning algorithm to learn from financial market uncertainties.

explanations.representation learning: The FED method decomposes financial time series data into distinct components, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.encoder-decoder: The paper explicitly mentions a variational encoder-decoder (FED) method for data augmentation.
explanations.autoencoder: A variational encoder-decoder is a type of autoencoder, which is used for data augmentation in this context.
